page.title: 05TYPICAL DAY IN BUCKLAND
page.content: My Home. I live in a house with my Mum and Dad and my brother and sister. Our house is quite old and we bought it when we moved in. The area I live in is{Buckland,}Portsmouth. In our house we have three bedrooms, a living room, kitchen and bathroom. The area I live in is quite nice. We have{corner shops}on the right and left hand side of our street which sell everything. These are quite handy because one is a newsagents and one is a grocers which also sells all sorts of things that you can run out of. On{May Day}we had a{street party in our road. We had to pay but a lot of the things were free, like fish and chips. The children were given T shirts, pens and little gifts.
